mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (id, b_title, b_content, b_regdate, b_view, b_type, b_img) values(#{id}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, now(), 0, #{b_type}, #{b_img})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY b_type, b_regdate DESC
SELECT id FROM member as a JOIN board as b ON a.id = b.id WHERE b.b_no = #{b_no}

choose.when: WHERE id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY b_type, b_regdate DESC
WHERE b_type=#{type} AND (id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')) ORDER BY b_type, b_regdate DESC
choose.otherwise: WHERE b_type=#{type} ORDER BY b_type, b_regdate DESC
